Source.Name: geany
Source.Summary: Small and lightweight integrated development environment in GTK2
Source.Description: Geany is a small and lightweight integrated development environment written in GTK2, designed to be fast and require minimal dependencies. It has syntax highlighting, code folding, autocomplete, a build system, and a plugin system.
